summary: Adds in executioner blocks, axes and the armor in the main cities of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[heading][b][color=red]Executioner's Gear of Skyrim[/color][/b][/heading]

I thought it was a little strange that there was only a single executioners block in the game, in Solitude, but each Hold tracked it's crime separately. So, I added in a block to each city, with the Headsmen Axe, as well as the gear in the guard barracks. Most of the stuff isn't hard to find, just look around the city in places that are out of the way. I left Solitude alone, for obvious reasons.

The armor will only show on MALE characters, it will appear as shrouded armor on females. This is an original issue in the CK and I do not know how to fix it.

This was inspired by a request on the Nexus, but I didn't have the skills to do the full request. But, if anyone wants to use this for something, feel free! (Just PM me first!)

[color=darkorange]===[b]Installation:[/b]====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM. To uninstall, just remove the file.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else. I will allow editing, if notified.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
